revised_title: A Review of Ptolemy's Work on Music and Sound
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of Ptolemy's work on music and sound, including his theories on musical tones, harmony, and the comparison of music to the motions of the human soul and celestial bodies. The author also discusses the restoration and perfecting of the Greek text, as well as the addition of a new Latin translation and notes on the text. The work is considered an important resource for understanding ancient Greek music and its comparison with modern music.
